thread.title: Russia establishes contact with Turkey, Israel on Syria flights - Region - World
thread.title_full: Russia establishes contact with Turkey, Israel on Syria flights - Region - World - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Russia establishes contact with Turkey, Israel on Syria flights - Region - World
text:
Related Russia says all planes in Syria safe, drones 'working as normal' Turkish, Russian military in talks over airspace violation UPDATED: Russia says 'hotline' with Israel set up to avoid Syria clashes Putin says Russia, Turkey fail to agree on Syria Russia's Defence Ministry said on Friday it had established direct contact with the Turkish military to avoid incidents with flights near the Turkish border, Interfax news agency reported, citing Colonel-General Andrei Kartapolov.
Russia has also established a hotline between a base used by the Russian air force in Syria and the Israeli air force command centre to coordinate on Syria flights, Kartapolov told reporters.
